verses.verse: Now it happened <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H8334>servant,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4872>"Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> is <S%H4191>dead;<s%> now therefore <S%H6965>arise,<s%> go <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H5971>you,<s%> and all this people, to the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H1121>them,<s%> even to the children of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you every <S%H4725>place<s%> that the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot<s%> will tread <S%H1869>on,<s%> as I <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

From the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and this <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> even to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> toward the going <S%H3996>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> shall be your <S%H1366>border.<s%>

No <S%H376>man<s%> will be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life.<s%> As I was with <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so I will be with <S%H7503>you.<s%> I will not fail you nor forsake <S%H5800>you.<s%>

"Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous;<s%> for you shall cause this <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to give <S%H5414>them.<s%>

Only be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H553>courageous,<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all the <S%H8451>law,<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5493>you.<s%> Don't turn from it to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left,<s%> that you may have good <S%H7919>success<s%> wherever you <S%H3212>go.<s%>

This <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> but you shall <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on it <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> that you may <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6743>therein:<s%> for then you shall make your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous,<s%> and then you shall have good <S%H7919>success.<s%>

<S%H6680>Haven't<s%> I commanded <S%H2388>you?<s%> Be strong and <S%H553>courageous.<s%> <S%H6206>Don't<s%> be afraid, neither be <S%H2865>dismayed:<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is with you wherever you <S%H3212>go.<s%>"

<S%H5674>"Pass<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the midst of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3559><s%> 'Prepare <S%H6720>food;<s%> for within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you are to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> to go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>'"
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> gives you <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> you this <S%H776>land.<s%>

Your <S%H802>wives,<s%> your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and your <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> shall <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> but you shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> over <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H2571>armed,<s%> all the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and shall help <S%H5826>them<s%>

until <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5117>given<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H5117>rest,<s%> as he has <S%H5117>given<s%> <S%H3423>you,<s%> and they have also possessed the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H7725>them.<s%> Then you shall return to the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H3425>possession,<s%> and possess <S%H4872>it,<s%> which Moses the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise.<s%>'"

They <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "All that you have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us we will <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H834>wherever<s%> you <S%H7971>send<s%> us we will <S%H3212>go.<s%>

Just as we <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in all <S%H8085>things,<s%> so will we listen to <S%H3068>you.<s%> Only may Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> be with <S%H4872>you,<s%> as he was with Moses.

<S%H376>Whoever<s%> <S%H4784>rebels<s%> against your <S%H6310>commandment,<s%> and <S%H8085>doesn't<s%> listen to your <S%H1697>words<s%> in all that you <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H4191>him,<s%> he shall be put to death. Only be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous.<s%>"
